githapi 0.9.22
  • Reference
  • Release Notes

Get information about a user's, organization's or team's repositories.

Source: R/repositories-deprecated.R
gh_repositories.Rd

https://developer.github.com/v3/repos/#list-user-repositories https://developer.github.com/v3/repos/#list-organization-repositories https://developer.github.com/v3/orgs/teams/#list-team-repos

gh_repositories(
  owner,
  team,
  type = NULL,
  sort = NULL,
  direction = NULL,
  n_max = 1000L,
  token = gh_token(),
  api = getOption("github.api"),
  ...
)

Arguments

owner

(string) The user or organization owning the repository.
team

(string) The team owning the repository.
type

(string, optional) Can be one of all, owner, member. Default: owner.
sort

(string, optional) Can be one of created, updated, pushed, full_name. Default: full_name.
direction

(string, optional) Can be one of asc or desc. Default: when using full_name: asc, otherwise desc.
n_max

(integer, optional) Maximum number to return. Default: 1000.
token

(string, optional) The personal access token for GitHub authorisation. Default: value stored in the environment variable GITHUB_TOKEN or GITHUB_PAT.
api

(string, optional) The URL of GitHub's API. Default: the value stored in the environment variable GITHUB_API or https://api.github.com.
...

Parameters passed to gh_page().

Value

A tibble describing all the repositories a user or organization has (see GitHub's API documentation for more detail).

Details

Note: Must specify either owner or team, but not both.

Contents

  • Arguments
  • Value
  • Details
